body: Uwhooooo chapter 3!!
Well it is what it is see you guys 8 months ish from now waiting for translation to come out

Part 3 is finally out. Nice! Safi's being more honest it seems. And Iris will finally get more focus next chapter. While it sucks that the e-hentai galleries were taken down, it's great that this has an official translation now.

To give some more context tho: The innkeeper turns into slime and fucks the elf, to her pleasure. The priestess finds her, but she tells her she's alright; the slime only melted her clothes, nothing else. After the Hero finds her naked, he says "It's been a while, huh?" and they have sex that night. Unsatisfied, she visits the innkeeper and teases him before quickly admitting she likes his cock more than the Hero's and even heals his arm. She falls asleep in his room. The next morning, Hero says "I wanna leave soon, but I gotta deal with this little guy. Help me out, Iris," leading her to suck him off. For some reason, the innkeeper says Iris is a nice name.

Translator from the past two parts here. The author has licensed their work, so uploads of this to the galleries isn't possible (surprised this stayed up long enough to byle copied here). Official English releases are at https://irodoricomics.com/Ayakawa-Riku?target=artist so please support the artist, especially if you'd like to see more from them.
这个系列直接社保好吗

Safi calls the Hero as her boyfriend, and seeing as how Iris, the priest just casually walks in the room asking for her, probably the official girlfriend (unless they're in a harem arrangement). Seems like Iris' turn next, as the Innkeeper does have debts to settle with her from getting splashed with holy water twice. His relationship with Safi also starts with him not liking her attitude. But I hope it's just to show the elf her boyfriend is cheating with her friend and makes her decide to break up. Love the one girl route so far (her happy face in p40 top panel is really cute), and she shows about more caring about him beyond than just sex (like worrying about his injuries). Fighter is still untouched, so this is gonna be a longer series isn't it.
